author: gshimansky
msg: Applied HARMONY-3074 [drlvm][classloader][jni] When FindClass is called from JNI_OnLoad function it cannot load user application classes
Also added regression test for this bug.
Tests passed on Ubuntu6 x86, Windows 2003 server x86 and SuSE9 x86_64

msg: Version of forrest projectInfo plugin set to 0.1, otherwise forrest fails due to its maven like plugin update feature.
